backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic with authorization, blob storage mixins, and various data types and state maps for users, products, orders, media, publications, and training materials.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a frontend change to make Training Document #2 open its PDF in a new tab, including affected file and component metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, UI behavior, and design changes across the app.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading the React application by mounting the root div and importing main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component handling identity, profile setup, payment status routing, and rendering all major sections under a forced light theme.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section fetching dynamic content and rendering a portrait with animated parallax, lighting effects, and styled textual biography details.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Booking section showing consulting rate info and membership-gated session booking with login prompts and themed visual effects.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Implements a slide-out shopping cart with item listing, removal, total calculation, and Stripe checkout handling.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information fetched from the backend with phone, email, and location details.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Renders a credentials section showcasing Ph.D. and Master's diploma images with styled layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Shows a footer containing detailed professional credentials and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with navigation, scroll behavior, and Internet Identity login/logout integration.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Creates a dynamic hero section with parallax background effects and central portrait content.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Displays a training videos section with membership-gated access, authentication checks, and visual effects.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Displays membership plans, handles authentication status, PayPal subscription redirection, and shows premium access features and member state.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a payment cancellation message with options to return home or scroll back to the membership section.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Displays a successful payment confirmation, refreshes membership data, and provides navigation to home or content sections.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal for creating a basic user profile with name, email, and optional phone, submitting via a profile-saving API mutation.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Fetches and displays a list of publications with Amazon links and includes a PayPal payment section.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Shows a list of apparel items with purchase links and QR codes, linking to Bonfire product pages.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Admin-only modal to enter and save Stripe secret key and allowed countries using a mutation.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Static section displaying Venmo and Cash App donation cards with styled backgrounds and links.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Fetches and displays training videos and documents, offering external links and a PayPal donation option.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks that wrap backend actor calls for profiles, content, store data, training resources, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, CSS variables for light/dark themes, and custom utility classes for glow, shadows, and decorative effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then mounts App with global styles.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetUrl.ts: Constructs safe URLâ€‘encoded paths for static assets, handling absolute URLs and cleaning /assets/ prefixes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, shadows, radii, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current state, known issues, and feature requests related to fixing Training Document #2 PDF linking.
